body_html:
I just checked, and no machines test and release infra currently has avx2 extensions.
We are all blocked on services providing these machines to us, therefore for the time being, we can build, but we cannot test it for avx2.

Given the fragility of the avx build, we have to test it and fix all the issues with avx2.
http://ci.tensorflow.org/view/Nightly/job/nightly-matrix-cpu-mavx/

All things considered, official support for avx2 is infeasible right now. We will reevaluate this in a quarter. I am closing this issue for now.

All things considered, official support for avx2 is infeasible right now. We will reevaluate this in a quarter. I am closing this issue for now.
body:
I just checked, and no machines test and release infra currently has avx2 extensions.
We are all blocked on services providing these machines to us, therefore for the time being, we can build, but we cannot test it for avx2.

Given the fragility of the avx build, we have to test it and fix all the issues with avx2.
http://ci.tensorflow.org/view/Nightly/job/nightly-matrix-cpu-mavx/

All things considered, official support for avx2 is infeasible right now. We will reevaluate this in a quarter. I am closing this issue for now.
